title: Agent Roles & Documentation
description: Documentation for AI agent roles (architect, worker, reviewer) and their workflows with the Moe board.
architectureNotes: MD files should be placed in docs/agents/ directory. Each role file should contain: role description, responsibilities, MCP tools used, workflow steps, and example prompts.
epicRails: All agent docs in docs/agents/ directory
Use consistent markdown structure across all role files
Include mermaid diagrams for workflow visualization
